text:
Hi Harol,

Coding is def a plus when you get to more senior roles as you’ll be able to setup workflows and defined best practices and tools to help other artists. You won’t necessarily need those skills as an entry level unless you want to take that route as a main job - a developer.

Python is by far the la guage we use the most in the industry. In some more advanced projects C++ is used too.

What sort of file management software? Or is it just mentioning file management in general?  In these cases I believe you get to learn in the job. Each company has their own way of handling the gigantic ammount of files we deal with every day.
